titleStmt.title: Persecution impeached as a traytor against God, his laws and government and the cause of the antient martyrs vindicated against the cruelty inflicted upon them by the papists in former dayes : being a brief answer to a book called Semper iidem, or, A parallel of phanaticks &c. lately published by a nameless author.
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: "Wherein is contained a relation of the martyrdom of many such as dissented from and opposed the Church of Rome, who are in the said book villified and reproached by the name and term of ancient phanaticks."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
